text:
Jimmy Carr on tour in Australia and New Zealand. 
Hilarity shall ensue.
To those who say he is offensive, you are correct. Well spotted. 
Jimmy Carr » Bohm Presents https://t.co/bwuQSEW5SJ
Listen more than once. It’ll get you.

Good morning.
Have a grand day. https://t.co/y2b5x7RbNG
Zen and the art of Songwriting
Good morning. Live from Woolloomooloo . https://t.co/xIJRuc0weG

There’s a vibe in Bligh Street.
French.
Live Jazz. 
Neuf-Du-Pape. https://t.co/J2ynkPWKuJ
The absolute best in the game. His dulcet tones will be sorely missed. Ray Warren brought a drama and a sense of occasion to every game he called.
@MichaelBuie I think I remember seeing you in a tshirt, casually hanging outside at -20F, so you’re obviously ruled out of any reasonable conversation regarding temperature.
And a very good morning to you all… she’s a bit nippy outside, 9°Celsius. https://t.co/3XA1tdknFp

This looks great. On Saturday night in Port Macquarie @LeahPurcell15 is hosting a screening and Q&A. Majestic Cinema’s 6:45pm ( cinema 3 ).
On Sunday she’s doing the same in Kempsey, Nambucca Heads and Sawtell. 
Opens Maoriland Film festival in Otaki June 29th @TaikaWaititi https://t.co/Tf9QA9grBN

The sunset view from Capo Crudo in Valletta a couple of nights ago.
Great restaurant. If you’ve never been to Malta, you should put it on your list. I love it there. https://t.co/RaKz14esrJ

Some sad news.
At 29 years of age. 
Champion cutting horse, mother of two, movie star…my amazing  Honey has passed away. She spent nearly 22 years of her life living with me. https://t.co/FEjnUFWEjV
Bangkok, a big decision looms. Intrepid reporter ⁦@tinchok555⁩ is on the case. Who should be the next Governor ? https://t.co/FyuBtlNSNC
The Nice Guys on UK tv

While training for Cinderella Man I experienced a subluxation of my left shoulder which required surgery. I knew that Ron Howard and the studio were concerned so I thought I’d send a video to relax them.
21 days after surgery I was back in the ring.
Pleasant pastures seen…and inexplicable ancient rubble … ah, the daily commute … https://t.co/b1ftMHbVoJ
@DariusAryaDigs La Rosetta !! Say hello to Massimo for me

@PatrickGman @bryandick @Paul_Bettany @leeingleby @TonyDolanUK1 @BillyBoydActor @Edwoodall @marklewisjones @JosephMorgan Good idea. I shall alert the Admiralty and put something in motion.
London ?

7mate tonight.

Watch The Water Diviner live or on-demand | Freeview Australia https://t.co/9SnCwvHSJD
@nzskylovingdiva Very kind of you to say Helen.

The comic genius @RyanGosling . 
He wrote this bit. In one swift rehearsal , he charmed the producers @colbertlateshow , Stephen &  @JonBatiste into letting him upend their show. Brilliant. 

Russell Crowe Thinks He Doesn't Need Ryan Gosling https://t.co/9Y8QOasYdA via @YouTube
New buddies to talk to ! https://t.co/0rQ4XPbaS9
Enjoy your Easter. In whatever form you celebrate it or ignore it. https://t.co/DwfaoKl8QM

Sunday April 17 there’ll be an Easter Hat Dog Show at the Coffs Harbour jetty to raise awareness of the @GAPNSW  rehoming program. GAP stands for Greyhounds as Pets. 
If you like doggy style… hmmm that doesn’t sound right … if you like stylish dogs, like my good man below, go! https://t.co/qRg3I6p9n3
@CGeee Welcome back to Australia Cgeee. Hope you have a great holiday.
@debourbonhorto1 @Qantas There’s a few around. Block and report please

Time lapse over the Hindu Kush. Taken by ⁦@Qantas⁩ pilot 
Hercules Demirgelis . I went to high school (Sydney Boys) for a couple of years with Herc.
Dreamliner 787 at 39,000 feet .
Air India jet comes into the picture at 37,000 feet. Not a bad office for the flight crew. https://t.co/SXzTQzrzOB
Very kind of you Caroline. The Charlie Teo Foundation is focused on Brain Cancer in children. They cap their costs at 20% and publish where every dollar goes.
Thank you Ernesto and Ernesto’s mum.

Why does this haunting little ditty affect me so ?

I love this song.

Lucy Spraggan - Tea & Toast (Official Video) https://t.co/FkOj8zAKUO via @YouTube

You see?
Between the darkness and the opaque … there’s the light .. it’s your choice https://t.co/zKKtcMD8Ob

Good morning .
Shall we get up and see what the world has to offer ? https://t.co/3WEfmPAJU6
I had a great day. Not as great, I would suggest, as these wind warriors. https://t.co/JnQ0l3sWKd
Work day done. The journey home part 1. https://t.co/3CEx2b5G6a
Don’t worry mate. I’m a fan of watching your work. You’ve still got it. All class.

It’s the 20th anniversary of BBC6. On BBC sounds now you can listen to curated year by year playlists. 

This Is Us - 6 Music at 20 - 2003: Russell Crowe - BBC Sounds https://t.co/s1no5o9XxP
We have a visitor at the moment. This is Brian the Beagle. Pretty sure he’s a Charlie Brown/Snoopy fan… will keep an eye out for the Red Barron. https://t.co/TmTOOhzDbh

William Hurt has passed. On Robin Hood, I was aware of his reputation for asking character based questions, so I had compiled a file on the life of William Marshall. He sought me out when he arrived on set. I handed him the stack. Not sure if I’ve ever seen a bigger smile. RIP.
BBC Radio 6 Music - This Is Us - 6 Music at 20, 2003: Russell Crowe https://t.co/AXLF1qIksH

For clarity:
A “ much-watch “ movie is a must watch movie much watched…

Gold medalists, billionaires, fastest gun in the world. Oscars. Amy when she was a baby shark.
Our last Crown dinner. 
Lots of love Shane . https://t.co/RaTRe5cIAc

S.K. Warne.

Woke this morning to the devastating news. Having a hard time accepting it. 

Genius player. 
Grand company.
Loyal friend.
Ivan Durrant - 7 people in the snow  (1975) https://t.co/elLNS5WVQX
